title: Science Inquiry and Emotional Reflection Based on Practitioner Landscape (Practicescape)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts (biology, chemistry, physics)
context.additional_context: Learners record and share the scientific inquiry process using personal devices, completing project portfolios that reflect emotional experiences

learning_goals: Learners can identify and describe three or more emotional changes occurring during scientific inquiry processes using the 7 Practicescape framework
Learners can creatively express positive emotions experienced in self-designed science experiments through poetry or essay formats
Learners can produce project outcomes reflecting the connection between science and human experiences based on peer feedback and self-reflection

resources: Digital Portfolio Platforms (e.g., Notion, Google Sites)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
